text: Consider that RO, at the beginning of the execution of the following piece of code, contains the value 0XO000A7F3 (hexadecimal). Instruction Meaning I1. ADDI R1, 0, O // Rl «0+0 I2. L: BEQ R0, $ZERO, EXIT // if RO == 0 then jump to exit 13. ENDI R2, RO, 1 // R2 « RO and 1 I4. 2DD R1, R1, R2 // Rl « Rl + R2 15. SRL RO, RO, 1 // shift right logical RO by 1 bit I6. 3j L // Unconditional jump to L I7. Exit: HALT The number of times statement of loop executed is,
